Summarise boxplot stats

Source: R/summarise_boxplot_stats.R
summarise_boxplot_stats.Rd

Summarise boxplot stats

summarise_boxplot_stats(data, var, ...)

Arguments

data

A tibble or dataframe. Required input.
var

A numeric variable. Required input.
...

Passed to boxplot.stats

Value

A tibble or dataframe.

Examples

library(dplyr)
library(simplevis)
library(palmerpenguins)

penguins %>%
  group_by(sex, species) %>%
  summarise_boxplot_stats(body_mass_g)
#> # A tibble: 8 × 3
#> # Groups:   sex [3]
#>   sex    species   body_mass_g
#>   <fct>  <fct>     <list>     
#> 1 female Adelie    <dbl [5]>  
#> 2 female Chinstrap <dbl [5]>  
#> 3 female Gentoo    <dbl [5]>  
#> 4 male   Adelie    <dbl [5]>  
#> 5 male   Chinstrap <dbl [5]>  
#> 6 male   Gentoo    <dbl [5]>  
#> 7 NA     Adelie    <dbl [5]>  
#> 8 NA     Gentoo    <dbl [5]>  

penguins %>%
  group_by(sex, species) %>%
  summarise_boxplot_stats(body_mass_g) %>%
  gg_boxplot_col(sex, body_mass_g, species, stat = "identity")
